main.name: Ghulam Mustafa
main.description: Passionate Software Engineer and confident individual who loves to take challenges and explore new things.
main.bio: Greetings, I am a passionate software engineer having around 5 years of working experience in providing IT services to many local and international clients. I possess adequate experience to become a part of the software development stages such as designing, developing and testing. Exploring and learning new things, passionate about developing web and mobile apps, active presence in social communities, always eager to know about new tech and trends related to computer science. A passionate and enthusiastic person who like to meet new people and love to cater different challenges and solve them through my abilities.
main.contactmessage: DISCUSS A PROJECT OR JUST WANT TO SAY HI? MY INBOX IS OPEN FOR ALL.

Cleared high school subjects and secured A grade

work.title: Mobile App Developer
description: Managing Unilever's core mobile application 'Roll', used by retailers to place orders
Ensuring smooth functionality and user experience for retail partners
Implementing updates and enhancements to support retailer needs

work.title: ReactJS/React Native Developer
description: Developing features for the Udhaar Book mobile application to enhance digital ledger experience
Focused on creating a seamless customer experience for managing digital khata
Collaborating with teams to implement and optimize new app features

work.title: Full stack Developer
description: Built and optimized mobile applications in React Native for retailer, picker, and driver roles
Contributed to the growth and efficiency of mobile applications through backend development using Node.js and PostgreSQL.
Ensured reliable app performance and usability across various user types

work.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed client projects using React Native, Node.js, and Redux
Collaborated on projects that required cross-functional technical expertise
Contributed to delivering quality mobile and web solutions for various clients

work.title: MERN Stack Developer
description: Worked on multiple freelance projects using ReactJS, Redux, React Native, and Expo CLI
Delivered solutions across the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js)
Developed scalable and robust web and mobile applications for diverse clients

work.title: ReactJS Developer
description: Worked on projects using ReactJS, Redux, and AWS serverless technologies
Built and managed databases with DynamoDB, and created Lambda functions
Focused on scalable, cloud-native applications leveraging AWS services

work.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed web and mobile applications using JavaScript, React, React Native, and Node
Utilized Koa.js, PostgreSQL, and Swagger for API documentation and integration
Collaborated with teams using Trello for project management and task tracking

testimonials.text: Very responsive to communication. Delivery was well within expectations. Some very good , prudent, improvement suggestions were made that made the app better. Quality was excellent.
After a pleasant previous experience I was happy to return with more work. Delivery was quick and quality of work was good. Recommend!
